name: Minimal Device Mockups
description:
Minimal Device Mockups


  • 100% vector mockups
  • Easy to customize
  • Change aspect ratio to fit any kind of screen
  • Desktop, tablet & mobile
  • Wireframes, flat & 3D


I made these for showing my work in my portfolio: there are wireframe devices for low-fi as well as 3Dish devices for high-fi.


Did you like these mockups? Let me know in the comments 💬 or by clicking the 🖤.

Happy designing! 🌈
